page.title: 20PLAYGROUND GAMES DUNLOP
page.content: THERE ARE A LOT OF GAMES PLAYED IN THE PLAYGROUND AND WE HELD A SURVEY TO FIND THE MOST POPULAR GAMES.IN THE WINTER IT IS SNOWBALL FIGHTS WITH 79% OF THE VOTES AND IN THE SUMMER IS CHASING WITH 39% OF THE VOTES.PRIMARY 4,5'S FAVOURITE GAME IS{PIGGYBACK {FIGHTS.}PRIMARY 5,6'S FAVOURITE GAME IS HOSPITAL TIG.HOSPITAL TIG IS A GAME PLAYED IN A LARGE RECTANGLE LIKE A NETBALL PITCH.IF YOU GO OUT OF THE RECTANGLE YOU ARE{HET.}EACH TIME YOU ARE{TUG}YOU HAVE TO HOLD WHERE YOU WERE{TUG.}IF YOU ARE{TUG}THREE TIMES YOU ARE{HET.}IF THE PERSON THAT IS{HET GOES OUT OF THE RECTANGLE EVERYBODY GETS THREE LIVES AGAIN. { PIGGYBACK FIGHTS}ARE WHEN A PERSON GOES ON ANOTHER PERSONS BACK AND THEY TRY TO PUSH ANOTHER PAIR OVER. { TUG}PAST TENSE OF TIG USED LOCALLY. { HET}PERSON THAT IS CHASING
